But the promotional period ends on 30 June this year. Here's the significant bit about yesterday's announcement: "The service is available today as a cloud offering," said Steve Ballmer . This is the first time we've made a release in the cloud before we have done so in the server version, and I think that really reflects the push by Microsoft into the cloud. All of which chimes well with an internal MS memo seen by this reporter last October that noted: "Business processes that have remained untouched for years urgently need to be examined."
